description: write a catchy, compelling alternative title to the reading and a very short 250 word abstract in your own words
draw a Venn diagram, flowchart, or any type of visual that summarizes how the big ideas from the reading this week connect to one another
draw a fun cartoon summarizing the reading this week
a good reading or paper should generate as many new questions as the ones it answers, list a few for the reading this week
sketch a plot of data you would like to see supporting the main idea or hypothesis in the reading this week
sketch a next step experiment of any sort to support the reading this week
